title: T3 flat for sale in Portas de Benfica - Mercado de Benfica
description: This comment was automatically translated and may not be 100% accurate. See description in the original language FANTASTIC 3-BEDROOM APARTMENT IN BENFICA, COMPLETELY RENOVATEDREILAR invites you to visit this 3-bedroom apartment in Benfica, on Estrada de Benfica, completely renovated and equipped, including Home Staging.This charming 3-bedroom apartment is located on the 3rd floor of a building without an elevator, featuring modern finishes and an equipped kitchen, providing a contemporary living experience.With a gross living area of 90m2, the kitchen is equipped with a hob and oven, extractor fan, built-in washing machine and dishwasher, built-in fridge freezer and water heater, white lacquered kitchen cabinets as well as the apartment doors, false ceilings with LED lighting throughout the property, white PVC window frames with tilt-and-turn windows and double glazing, and electric PVC blinds with thermal break.This home is ideal for those seeking a residential environment in a family-friendly neighborhood, full of commerce and services, with the Sete Rios and Laranjeiras metro stations as public transport options, facilitating travel around the city, the Catholic University, the Zoo, etc.This is more than just an apartment; it is the opportunity to live in a central area, with everything you need within reach.Schedule a visit today to explore all the unique features of this apartment on Estrada de Benfica.For more information or to schedule a visit, call me!Alcides Reduto, your Real Estate Consultant.CAN'T FIND THE PROPERTY YOU ARE LOOKING FOR?Did you know that there are owners who prefer that their properties not be advertised?It's true! We have more properties available on our REILAR portal and others still waiting for you.Energy Category: Dref: L3/02343.
